actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to suspend certain requirements until it is determined or agreed that the requirements do not violate the General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Suspends certain requirements contained in the Act of February 16, 1938, until: (1) it is agreed among the parties of the General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade (GATT) that such requirements do not violate such Agreement; or (2) there is a final determination, under the dispute resolution procedure established for GATT, that they do not violate it.

titles.title: A bill to suspend certain requirements until it is determined or agreed that the requirements do not violate the General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade, and for other purposes.
